name: Save the City (with water!)
description: Save the City (with water!) is a game that I created together with a team formed on the spot during the 48-hour Clickteam Full Sail Game Jam 2014. For this Game Jam we had to create a game using the Clickteam Fusion 2.5 engine, and follow the theme that was set for this Game Jam which was "Just add water." In this game you fly around in a helicopter trying to extinguish fires in a procedurally generated map. My primary responsibility working with both the engineer and artist to make sure we had all the materials needed. I was involved with fine-tuning of game mechanics that included the water and fire contact radius. I heavily playtested the game with both members in order to find the best balance of fun and difficulty. Additionally I did the menu layouts using art supplied by our artist to ensure a professional feel to the project.
